job.title: Principal Software Engineer
job.description:
--this position is fully remote and you can work anywhere in the US.--
We are a fast-growing and unique company looking to bring on a 100% Remote Principal Software Engineer to join our fast-growing team. We are an established, nation-wide startup company. We are a in the internet/e-commerce space and need Principal Engineers to join our dynamic team. We are wanting hands-on developers/Polyglot type candidates that are looking to grow within our company. If you are a 100% Remote Senior Software Developer with experience, please read on!
Top Reasons to Work with Us
Generous Compensation Package/Equity, Medical Benefits and Annual Salary Evaluation!
Job stability - We promote from within our organization!
Get to work with a great team of individuals in a dynamic company culture!
What's In It for You
We offer a comprehensive compensation plan including but not limited to:
A highly competitive salary
Bonus Package
Equity
Unlimited Vacation/PTO
Full benefits (Dental, Medical, Vision)
401k with company match
What You Need for this Position
Must Have
8+ Years engineering experience with a proven track record as an engineer building scalable web sites
5+ years of experience with the following languages: Agnostic
Experience with AWS, Azure, GCP
In-depth and hands on knowledge of data structures, algorithms and modern web and/or cloud technologies
Experience leading technical discussions including evaluation and design of technical solutions
Bachelor degree in Computer Science (or related field)
Pluses
Start-up environments or early stage companies
What You Will Be Doing
Lead cross functional projects across multiple teams impacting the success of the larger organization
Lead technical discussions, design/architect and implement solutions to scale our company
Support standard development practices, syntax, design patterns, and Test driven development
Evangelize impactful improvements in our technologies
Can trace bugs across the entire software stack, including into the OS, libraries, virtual machine and compiler if necessary
Implement and Monitor analytics to ensure the correctness of the business process
So, if you are a 100% Remote Senior Software Developer with experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Miranda.Orr@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : MO5-1630343 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Miranda Orr - Lead Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
CyberCoders will consider for Employment in the City of Los Angeles qualified Applicants with Criminal Histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring (Ban the Box) Ordinance.
